abstract: The decision on Tuesday by a Manhattan federal court judge to deny a motion by Indiana pension funds to move Chrysler’s bankruptcy case to district court removes a potential major obstacle to the carmaker’s sale to Fiat.
snippet: The decision on Tuesday by a Manhattan federal court judge to deny a motion by Indiana pension funds to move Chrysler’s bankruptcy case to district court removes a potential major obstacle to the carmaker’s sale to Fiat.

headline.main: Chrysler Sales Procedure to Go Forward

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
